verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> <WH8764> upon Muthlabben <WH4192> <WH1121>, A Psalm <WH4210> of David <WH1732>. I will praise <WH3034> <WH8686> thee, O YY <WH3068>, with my whole heart <WH3820>; I will shew forth <WH5608> <WH8762> all thy marvellous works <WH6381> <WH8737>.
I will be glad <WH8055> <WH8799> and rejoice <WH5970> <WH8799> in thee: I will sing praise <WH2167> <WH8762> to thy name <WH8034>, O thou most High <WH5945>.
When mine enemies <WH341> <WH8802> are turned <WH7725> <WH8800> back <WH268>, they shall fall <WH3782> <WH8735> and perish <WH6> <WH8799> at thy presence <WH6440>.
For thou hast maintained <WH6213> <WH8804> my right <WH4941> and my cause <WH1779>; thou satest <WH3427> <WH8804> in the throne <WH3678> judging <WH8199> <WH8802> right <WH6664>.

Thou hast rebuked <WH1605> <WH8804> the heathen <WH1471>, thou hast destroyed <WH6> <WH8765> the wicked <WH7563>, thou hast put out <WH4229> <WH8804> their name <WH8034> for ever <WH5769> and ever <WH5703>.

O thou enemy <WH341> <WH8802>, destructions <WH2723> are come to a perpetual <WH5331> end <WH8552> <WH8804>: and thou hast destroyed <WH5428> <WH8804> cities <WH6145> <WH8676> <WH5892>; their memorial <WH2143> is perished <WH6> <WH8804> with them <WH1992>.
But the YY <WH3068> shall endure <WH3427> <WH8799> for ever <WH5769>: he hath prepared <WH3559> <WH8790> his throne <WH3678> for judgment <WH4941>.
And he shall judge <WH8199> <WH8799> the world <WH8398> in righteousness <WH6664>, he shall minister judgment <WH1777> <WH8799> to the people <WH3816> in uprightness <WH4339>.
The YY <WH3068> also will be a refuge <WH4869> for the oppressed <WH1790>, a refuge <WH4869> in times <WH6256> of trouble <WH6869>.
And they that know <WH3045> <WH8802> thy name <WH8034> will put their trust <WH982> <WH8799> in thee: for thou, YY <WH3068>, hast not forsaken <WH5800> <WH8804> them that seek <WH1875> <WH8802> thee.
Sing praises <WH2167> <WH8761> to the YY <WH3068>, which dwelleth <WH3427> <WH8802> in TZiyon <WH6726>: declare <WH5046> <WH8685> among the people <WH5971> his doings <WH5949>.
When he maketh inquisition <WH1875> <WH8802> for blood <WH1818>, he remembereth <WH2142> <WH8804> them: he forgetteth <WH7911> <WH8804> not the cry <WH6818> of the humble <WH6035> <WH8675> <WH6041>.

Have mercy <WH2603> <WH8798> upon me, O YY <WH3068>; consider <WH7200> <WH8798> my trouble <WH6040> which I suffer of them that hate <WH8130> <WH8802> me, thou that liftest me up <WH7311> <WH8789> from the gates <WH8179> of death <WH4194>:
That I may shew forth <WH5608> <WH8762> all thy praise <WH8416> in the gates <WH8179> of the daughter <WH1323> of TZiyon <WH6726>: I will rejoice <WH1523> <WH8799> in thy salvation <WH3444>.

The heathen <WH1471> are sunk down <WH2883> <WH8804> in the pit <WH7845> that they made <WH6213> <WH8804>: in the net <WH7568> which <WH2098> they hid <WH2934> <WH8804> is their own foot <WH7272> taken <WH3920> <WH8738>.

The YY <WH3068> is known <WH3045> <WH8738> by the judgment <WH4941> which he executeth <WH6213> <WH8804>: the wicked <WH7563> is snared <WH5367> <WH8804> in the work <WH6467> of his own hands <WH3709>. Higgaion <WH1902>. Selah <WH5542>.
The wicked <WH7563> shall be turned <WH7725> <WH8799> into SH'ol <WH7585>, and all the nations <WH1471> that forget <WH7913> 'Elohim <WH430>.
For the needy <WH34> shall not alway <WH5331> be forgotten <WH7911> <WH8735>: the expectation <WH8615> of the poor <WH6041> <WH8675> <WH6035> shall not perish <WH6> <WH8799> for ever <WH5703>.
Arise <WH6965> <WH8798>, O YY <WH3068>; let not man <WH582> prevail <WH5810> <WH8799>: let the heathen <WH1471> be judged <WH8199> <WH8735> in thy sight <WH6440>.
Put <WH7896> <WH8798> them in fear <WH4172> <WH8675> <WH4172>, O YY <WH3068>: that the nations <WH1471> may know <WH3045> <WH8799> themselves to be but men <WH582>. Selah <WH5542>.
